title: Unbelievable stupid rules of banning people
body:

[5:01] Te Deum laudamus (Poppy): 3 mins
[5:55] Te Deum laudamus (Poppy): 2 min

[9:22] Te Deum laudamus (Poppy): ok report cassioepia nice toxic player
[9:30] Te Deum laudamus (Poppy): riot will remember about you this christmas
[9:43] Te Deum laudamus (Poppy): your gift is comming
[10:17] Te Deum laudamus (Poppy): u are ignorant cait and cassio
[10:21] Te Deum laudamus (Poppy): so its all about you
[2018-12-29 00:01:01 EET] Te Deum laudamus: rep casioo toxic player

Also imagine i could already got 10 games chat restriction, 20 games chat res, 2 weeks ban and after this ONE game i would be permabaned. Is this fair? Was i toxic? This cassipeia was toxic but they refuse to ban him - instead automatic system banned ME for writting this (this is no the whole conversation in the game - i was writting on support with ''human'' and he pointed to me those quotes as NEGATIVE and worth losing my honor 4 i was earining whole year)
